title: Tankard
description: Tankard, ceramic with pewter mounts, blue-green glaze on body, pewter base with pointed scallop edge, pewter lip with repeated trefoil edging, domed lid of German type with ball thumbpiece set on stem, fillet around center of ball and finial at top, lid crude repoussee decoration with coin inset in center showing deer and other animals, German, XVIIIc NO DIMS. ON CAT. CARDS
